arulkarthik, that torrent contained pro+ and visio & Project, this one contains all the apps in the other torrent but as single installers so if you only want certain apps then you get a smaller install footprint and only get updates for the apps you have rather than all the apps that are installed with pro+

"Product Activation Required", and also

"This product is unlicensed. Connect to your corporate network or contact your system administrator for furher assistance."

There is a key stored in the Product ID. Is this normal or should I use one of the activators that you have?

im pretty sure u have a life and all, but the lack of an answer is killing meeh! OR if anyone else could check their activation status which is located in File>Help, and post their status, that would be great as well too! HELPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP as im a paranoid mf. >:]
